targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	b.name as 'Motion Bull Campaign'
FROM 
	user_has_voice_queues a,
	voice_queues b,
	users c
WHERE 
	b.`type` = 'outbound'
	AND a.UserId = c.id
	AND a.VoiceQueueId = b.id
	AND c.name = '$agent'

SELECT 
	b.name as 'Voice Queue'
FROM 
	user_has_voice_queues a,
	voice_queues b,
	users c
WHERE 
	b.`type` = 'inbound'
	AND a.UserId = c.id
	AND a.VoiceQueueId = b.id
	AND c.name = '$agent'

SELECT
  now() as time,
	CASE 
		WHEN TYPE='outbound' THEN 'Dialer Campaign'
		WHEN TYPE='inbound' THEN 'Vocie Queue'
	END AS QueueType,
	COUNT(1) AS 'value'
FROM 
	voice_queues
WHERE 
	id in
	(
		SELECT voicequeueid FROM user_has_voice_queues WHERE userid= (SELECT id FROM users WHERE NAME='$agent')
	)
GROUP BY QueueType

SELECT 
	id AS 'User id',
	`name` AS login,
	fullname AS 'User name',
	email AS 'E-mail',
	internal AS 'PBX Extension',
	online as 'Logged'
FROM 
  users
WHERE 
  `name`='$agent'

SELECT 
	COUNT(a.id) as 'Total Calls'
FROM 
	report_call a,
	users b
WHERE
	b.name='$agent' 
	AND a.userId = b.id
	AND $__timeFilter(starttime)
ORDER BY
  a.type ASC;

SELECT 
	COUNT(a.id) as 'Total Calls',
	a.type as 'Call type',
	a.disposition as 'Result'
FROM 
	report_call a,
	users b
WHERE
	b.name='$agent' 
	AND a.userId = b.id
	AND $__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY 
	a.type,a.disposition
ORDER BY
  a.type ASC;

SELECT 
	$__timeGroup(a.starttime,'1h') as time,
	COUNT(a.id) AS 'value',
	CASE 
		WHEN a.type='dialer' AND a.disposition='ANSWERED' THEN "Dialer Answer"
		WHEN a.type='dialer' AND a.disposition='NO ANSWER' THEN "Dialer No Answer"
		WHEN a.type='outbound' AND a.disposition='ANSWERED' THEN "Manual Answer"
		WHEN a.type='outbound' AND a.disposition='NO ANSWER' THEN "Manual No Answer"
	END as metric	
FROM 
	report_call a,
	users b
WHERE
	b.name='$agent' 
	AND a.userId = b.id
GROUP BY 
	time,metric
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT 
	$__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
	COUNT(a.id) AS value,
	a.disposition as metric
FROM 
	report_call a,
	users b
WHERE
	b.name='$agent'
	AND 
	a.userId = b.id
	AND a.type='outbound'
GROUP BY 
	time, metric
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT 
	$__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') as time,
	COUNT(a.id) AS value,
	a.disposition as metric
FROM 
	report_call a,
	users b
WHERE
	b.name='$agent' 
	AND 
	a.userId = b.id
	AND a.type='dialer'
GROUP BY 
	time, metric
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'1h') ASC

SELECT 
	id AS 'Id',
	TYPE as 'Type',
	destination AS 'Destination',
	callerid AS  'Contact',
	duration AS 'Duration',
	disposition AS 'State',
	userdisposition AS 'Disposition',
	createdAt AS 'Date',
	contactId AS 'Contact Id' 
FROM 
  report_call 
WHERE 
  userid=(select id from users where name='$agent')
  and $__timeFilter(starttime)

SELECT 
	NOW() AS time_sec,
	TYPE AS metric,
	COUNT(TYPE) AS value
FROM 
  report_call 
WHERE 
  userid=(select id from users where name='$agent')
  and $__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY metric;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') as time,
  count(id)
FROM cm_hopper_final
WHERE
   LCASE(disposition) = 'acepta contrato'
   and $__timeFilter(starttime)
   and membername='$agent'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') ASC

SELECT
  now() AS "time",
  disposition as metric,
  count(disposition) as value
FROM cm_hopper_final
WHERE
  	membername = '$agent'
  and
    disposition IS NOT NULL
  and
	  $__timeFilter(createdAt)
group by disposition;

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') as time,
  count(id)
FROM report_call
WHERE
   LCASE(disposition) = 'ok, cerrado'
   and $__timeFilter(starttime)
   and userid=(select id from users where name='$agent')
   and type='inbound'
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') ASC

SELECT
  now() as 'time_sec',
	userdisposition as 'metric',
	COUNT(userdisposition) AS 'value'
FROM 
	report_call 
WHERE 
	userid=(SELECT id FROM users WHERE NAME='$agent')
	AND userdisposition IS NOT null
	AND TYPE='inbound'
GROUP BY
	userdisposition

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') as time,
  count(id) as value
FROM cm_hopper_final
WHERE
   membername='$agent'
   and LCASE(disposition) = 'reschedule'
   and $__timeFilter(starttime)
GROUP BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m')
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(starttime,'30m') ASC

SELECT 
	t1.data1 as 'Pause',
	SEC_TO_TIME(sum(duration)) AS "Total"
FROM 
	report_member t1
WHERE
 $__timeFilter(createdAt)
 AND t1.CHANNEL='voice'
 AND membername = '$agent'
 and type in ('PAUSE')
 AND lcase(data1) IN
 (
 		SELECT LCASE(name) FROM tools_pauses
 )
GROUP BY 
	t1.type,t1.data1

SELECT 
	enterAt,exitAt,SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(duration)) AS "Total" 
FROM 
	report_member 
WHERE 
	$__timeFilter(enterAt)
	AND CHANNEL='voice'  
	AND membername = '$agent'
	AND TYPE='LOGIN'
GROUP BY enterAt,exitAt,duration;

SELECT 
  type,duration,enterAt
FROM 
  report_member 
WHERE 
  channel='voice' 
  AND membername='$agent' 
  AND enterAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 MINUTE)

SELECT 
	TYPE AS metric,
	SUM(duration) AS value
FROM 
	report_member 
WHERE 
	CHANNEL='voice' 
	AND membername='$agent' 
	AND enterAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 MINUTE) 
GROUP BY metric

panels.description: Difference between Login state and Pause+Talking are due intermediate states as calling state

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
	type as 'State',
	SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(duration)) AS "Total"
FROM 
	report_member
WHERE
 $__timeFilter(createdAt)
 AND CHANNEL='voice'
 AND membername = '$agent'
GROUP BY 
	type;

panels.title: Total Time
